alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:10PM CDT until June 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Northern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Cross County in eastern Arkansas... Tipton County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Lauderdale County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 610 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marked Tree, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Germantown, Marion, Millington, Covington, Osceola, Trumann, Marked Tree, Lake City, Lepanto, Monette, Caraway, Luxora, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Fort Pillow State Park, Cordova and Memphis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
